sqlMap.select: select count(*) from reply where post_no=#postNo#

SELECT A.REPLY_NO replyNo ,A.MEM_ID memId ,NVL(B.PR_IMG_PATH, ' ') repPrImgPath ,NVL(B.STRE_IMG_NM, 'default_profile.png') repPrStrImgNm ,A.REPLY_CONTENT replyContent ,TO_CHAR(A.REPLY_DATE) replyDate FROM REPLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILE_IMG B ON (A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER C ON (A.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID) WHERE A.POST_NO = #postNo# AND C.MEM_DELETE = 'N' ORDER BY A.REPLY_NO

SELECT A.REPLY_NO replyNo ,A.MEM_ID memId ,A.POST_NO postNo ,NVL(B.PR_IMG_PATH, ' ') repPrImgPath ,NVL(B.STRE_IMG_NM, 'default_profile.png') repPrStrImgNm ,A.REPLY_CONTENT replyContent ,TO_CHAR(A.REPLY_DATE) replyDate FROM REPLY A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILE_IMG B ON (A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID) WHERE A.REPLY_NO = #replyNo#
